cars.description: Older on the year, but greater on the gas mileage. This one owner, mid sized truck is perfect for getting around without paying a ton on gas. Perfect starter truck.
This is an immaculate 2006 Ford F-150. Gaurenteed to handle the heavier projects. If you want a reliable truck that will last..The F150 will be the perfect fit. Built Ford Tough.
This 2009 Honda Civic will allow you to drive until the wheels fall off. You will have wonderful gas mileage as well as a beautiful and reliable vehicle for years to come.

Newer year-wise and a great cost. This car is spotless, great gas mileage, and has a warranty that is well worth the money. This is a perfect mid-sized sedan for when you have kids or if you want to keep on travelling!

If you want the smoothest ride out of all of these options- Look no further. This is a bed on wheels. It will feel like you are driving on clouds. The leather interior and the style alone will satisfy all of your car needs.

Want to go fast? This is the cream of the crop. 0-60 in .5ms. Yes, insane I know. But this car will blow your socks off and will feed your inner animal spirit. The interior is spotless and has had one owner. This will go quickly.
